sentences.en: Companies are also devising novel technologies to outfox the criminals.
sentences.cn: 制药公司也在发明新技术,令造假者无法得逞.

sentences.en: He can outfox his opponent almost every time.
sentences.cn: 他几乎每次都能智取他的敌手.

sentences.en: There is no greater thrill than to bluff a man, trap him, and outfox him.
sentences.cn: 没有什么比虚张声势吓唬别人、让他钻入圈套并用计将他击败更加刺激了。

trans.tran_en: If you outfox someone, you defeat them in some way because you are more clever than they are

trans.tran_cn: <非正>智胜，以计谋胜过，比…更狡猾
